about_the_game:
Game introduction

This is an RPG strategy adventure game that incorporates tabletop game elements and uses card construction as the main gameplay.

Main plot

A game called Greed Island is holding a trial session. 100 players from all over the world participated in this event and played on the latest virtual reality equipment. Not long after the trial started, the players They found that they could not leave the game, and there was a huge ancient tree where they were. Through talking to the NPC, they learned that most of the people who came here came here to reach the top of the soul tree, because it can realize your dreams. Any wish. Faced with the situation of being unable to return to reality, the players started their adventure with complicated emotions.

Gameplay

You will play Lin Yue, a player who is late for the trial meeting, and adventure in the fantasy world of swords and magic. You will get to know many players from the same world as you, as well as NPCs in the game, who may become you. A powerful partner on the way forward, or an enemy that can hinder or even destroy you.
During the adventure, you will be able to collect a variety of cards, equipment and props, and make full use of them to challenge various powerful enemies and learn the truth about this world.

Character introduction

Lin Yue. An editor from an ordinary magazine company attended a game trial session due to work reasons, but was late.
Zhou Mo. He used to be the best among players, but for some reason he gave up his adventure in the Soul Tree and lived in the Novice Village.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes content such as  partial nudity,  strong language, and violence.
